title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 53.1 - Introduction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 53.1 - Introduction

State Regulations

On and after January 1, 1966, no brake lining shall be
sold, offered for sale or distributed for use on a motor vehicle unless it is
approved by the Commissioner of Motor Vehicles in accordance with the
regulations established herein. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
53.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
